# Azure Pipeline

![Author](https://img.shields.io/badge/guru-marcel%20kornegoor-3399cc.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/Strobodov/Azure_Pipeline?logo=github)
![GitHub License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/Strobodov/Azure_Pipeline)
![GitHub code size in bytes](https://img.shields.io/github/languages/code-size/Strobodov/Azure_Pipeline?logo=github)
![GitHub top language](https://img.shields.io/github/languages/top/Strobodov/Azure_Pipeline?logo=github)

Git repo for the Azure CI/CD Pipeline Bash script

Hint: feel free to deploy other VM sizes, but make sure you always use a V3 instance, otherwise nested virtualization will not work.

```C++
for(int i=0;i=10;1++){
print("hoi")
}
```
